website_summaries.verdict: A uniquely designed bottle opener that's aesthetic and easy to store.
pros: Unique bottle openers are aesthetically pleasing and well-made
Roughly the size of a credit card so you can store them in your wallet
Heavy, durable material opens bottles with ease and without bending or breaking
cons: Some noticed minor imperfections in the black paint
May not pass through TSA checkpoint

customer_reviews.title: Bad printing
customer_reviews.text: The good thing about these ace card bottle openers is that the bottle opener part really works. But I ordered a pack and the ace emblems on the cards are all smudged like there was a problem in the printing process. I don't even want to give them as gifts because the quality seems very poor on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Splotchy Print, but Good Product
customer_reviews.text: They work and hold up well, but most of them had splotchy print that didnt look great. Some had the ink smudged pretty bad. All were slightly dirty with what looked like dried machining grease. I was still content with them after cleaning them off because they were cheap, still look okay, and they'll get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: John Clairmont

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep in your wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these out to all my friends because I loved mine so much. I keep it in my wallet and I can’t tell you how many times I’ve gone somewhere where we needed a bottle opener. I always liked to be prepared and this metal opener is easy to carry and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and does not feel cheap! They are very heavy and work great. Perfect for the men to just put in their wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be cleaned before distributing.
customer_reviews.text: Just remember, you get what you pay for here. They come individually wrapped but are smudged and need to be cleaned. Some of the printing looks worse in person. It’s cheap enough but I’m glad I only ordered one set. They are just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: Great price with this 8 pack!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my mom's casino themed 60th birthday. I had one on each table. Everyone loved them and took them home as party favors. They are wallet size but they are thick steel and probably too heavy to lug around all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MommyMary

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Works... Pretty much as described. I would actually give it 4.5 stars, just cause i think they could have rounded the corners a little better but not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for poker party
customer_reviews.text: I put these in thank you bags for a poker party. They seem very sturdy and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product for cost
customer_reviews.text: Durable and functions well. As other reviews said, the paint on the face is not perfect on all. We threw two away for that reason. These are a little heavy so maybe not great for carrying in wallet, but they will fit. Bought for my fiance's groomsmen as a bachelor party gift and they all liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Minick

customer_reviews.title: Cool, functional, affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased enough of these spade bottle openers to give as gifts to all my poker playing friends at a card night I hosted. Everyone seemed pretty happy with the appearance and functionality. I keep a few at my bar and take one with me if I am taking beer to an away card game. Opener works great. No problems with durability. It’s light and it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Leghart

customer_reviews.title: Great For Gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. I was able to give them out to my best friends. Fits right into the wallet like a credit card! It has a smooth finish, but it doesn't scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are lower quality than what other vendors are selling ...
customer_reviews.text: These are lower quality than what other vendors are selling in the same item. Thinner metal, and less finish on the edges. I am returning mine...
customer_reviews.author: BGW

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The sheet metal used is beefy and the printed are quite resistant. Have given these out as presents and always carry one in my wallet. No complaints whatsoever! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Use them as party gifts for a bridal shower, they were great
customer_reviews.author: Luna Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: There is only one bottle opener card that looks good. The other 7 have some deformity in the the ink. Besides that they are pretty thick.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: They loved them and still carry them in their wallets
customer_reviews.text: Got these for all the groomsmen. They loved them and still carry them in their wallets! Great quality and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our groomsman gift bags, they were a complete hit!! Very heavy, nicely made! Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good for price but some had marks on them or gouges...you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problem opening a bottle. Fits right in your credit card slot in your wallet..
customer_reviews.author: warren sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Great add on to my groomsmen boxes
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. The ink or imprint on the SS comes off rather too easily
customer_reviews.author: JA81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it - - A LOT!!! Made great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: LEE2

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Got these for grooms gifts, very cool and functional. Everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Ace of knaves

customer_reviews.title: These were a hit
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great gift to give to guys when you don’t know what to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany  L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the price. Would purchase again if needed to. Included them with the groomsmen gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool product. Printing of the spade was poor
customer_reviews.text: Cool product. Printing of the spade was poor. Got the pack of 8. Only 3 were well printed. The other 5 had smooshed spade in one corner. Using them as stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: CarJo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift for my groomsmen. They loved them. Great quality and very quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my friend's graduation gifts for those who have an alphabet A in their name. Loved them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Hye

customer_reviews.title: Pay for 3 sets got only one
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice but I order and pay for 3 sets and received only one set
customer_reviews.author: Aluizio Couto

customer_reviews.title: I only got 5 bottle openers. And one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I only got 5 bottle openers. And one of them has a big stain. I bought from Brazil and a friend of mine brought it to me. How can I be reimbursed?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so cool!
customer_reviews.text: So I brought an ice chest full of beer and liquor to a wedding. When I went to crack something open, I realized that I didn't have a bottle opener. My cousin had one of these and I fell in love. It's thick. Like a really thick credit card. But its thickness makes it able to open bottles with no issues. I bought a pack of 8 and gave them to my buddies to keep in their wallets and purses. We're all in love with them!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Costa

customer_reviews.title: Package open and didn’t have the 8 openers
customer_reviews.text: My package came open and didn’t have the 8 bottle openers it only had 5 inside
customer_reviews.author: Felix Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great groomsmen gift
customer_reviews.text: These were a great addition to my groomsmen gifts as we are all beer drinkers and we're also all poker players so they had a nice personal touch. They seem fine for your average bottle opener although I'm sure they could bend fairly easily with the right amount of pressure. If they are used as intended, they should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I got these at a great price, which was good because I needed 8
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as part of a groomsmen gift for my sister's wedding. I got these at a great price, which was good because I needed 8. They have a great weight to them, and I great design. They are perfect to put in your wallet. I'm only taking off one start because on the back of 4 of then the painted part was kinda faded or scratched off. But the front sizes were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sherrod reed

customer_reviews.title: Groomsmen gifts
customer_reviews.text: Nice but tarnished upon arrival. We still gave them to our groomsmen as it was too late to order other gifts.
customer_reviews.author: OliviaSR

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a card party that I had. It was the hit of the party for the men. Great gift and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our casino party
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy and a good favor for our annual company party where we do a casino theme.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cool bottle opener at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Cool bottle opener that's well made and unique. A bit too heavy for me to keep in my wallet but certainly easy enough to keep one in the bottom of your cooler and/or in your vehicle. The 8-pack is quite a value too.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brasky

customer_reviews.title: Daughter’s Sweet Sixteen themed party...Alice in Wonderland
customer_reviews.text: Guests thought they were great! Daughter’s name begins with an “A”. Got for daughter’s Sweet Sixteen themed party...Alice in Wonderland
customer_reviews.author: LRG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over the quality for the price! These are heavy duty. And you get 8 of them!! Can't wait to give these as favors at my party tomorrow night!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Deal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly heavy and thick. Well made, Everyone i gave these to loves it! Shipped sooo fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Neves

customer_reviews.title: Smudged paint.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for my used, but the paint is definitely smudged.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient as it is credit card size and fits into wallet also great gift for a 21 year old when on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Fuerstey

customer_reviews.title: They have such a good weight to them and they look awesome
customer_reviews.text: i thought these would be a little on the cheap side, boy was i wrong. They have such a good weight to them and they look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved these favors for Casino Night
customer_reviews.text: What a hit!!! Everyone loved these favors for Casino Night.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: These are very sturdy! The groomsmen will love them
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy! The groomsmen will love them! very easy to sore and keep on them at all times. They look better than normal bottle openers.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! The groomsmen loved it! My husband engraved them and personalized them.
customer_reviews.author: aesx2

customer_reviews.title: Nice little item to share
customer_reviews.text: Unique item; everyone who's been gifted one so far has admired it.
customer_reviews.author: Al, Milford, CT

customer_reviews.title: awesome party favor for casino themed party/poker party
customer_reviews.text: this was the hit when it came to party favors. everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: SD Lady

product_meta.title: BeautyMood 8pcs Wine Bottle Opener, Stainless Steel Credit Card Size Casino Bottle Opener for Your Wallet, Beer Bottle Opener
feature_bullets: Slim style easily fits in your pocket
Easily open your beer and soda bottles
Ace Spades Poker opener , Great for Parties & BBQs & Traveling & as a Gift
Use the cleverly crafted hole in the center shaped like a spade to open your beer and soda bottles
